extendedInfo.description: NOTE: there's no dependency between this widget and any other Facebook app. There's NO need to install any Facebook app to make it work.GO FBWidget â More Features gives you the best Facebook experience on Android devices!GO FBWidget brings you the easiest way to check your Facebook timeline and profile just directly on your home screen. You can also take photos and share them with your friends in a super fast way. Like other GOWidgets, theme is also supported.You must install the latest version of GO Launcher EX which is the most popular home launcher app in Android Market.Place this widget on your home screen, scroll to view, reply and share photos on your home screen and no need to jump to Facebook app!!!Available Size:- 4x4- 4x1Actions:- View- Like- Comment- Share your mind and photosHow to add GOWidgets on your home screen?- Long press on your home screen in GO Launcher EX. Press the GOWidget option and choose the widget you like. Make sure you have enough room for the widget.

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It\'s cool but I think a few upgrades would make it better like a search engine so that we can look for people we know statuses or just whoever we choose to search for
reviews.author: quintez fox

reviews.title: Fast!
reviews.comment: I\'m impressed with this widget and it\'s really fast and smooth. There is no lag whatsoever and I much prefer it to the actual Facebook app! Clicking on a new update opens instantly! Nice work Go Team!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Settings - clear cache & allow access
reviews.comment: I have been strugling a few days after installation in order to get this widget working properly. You have to give this widget access to Facebook after login (this can also be altered afterwards in your Facebook settings online). After that, I also cleared the data cache (tap & & hold on widget, go to settings & \'clear data cache\'). After that, this application works perfectly. Also looks nice with the transparant theme.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great but
reviews.comment: Why does it now say \"FB WIDGET\" On top? It used to say Facebook! I don\'t like that change it seems too tacky.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What u should do next
reviews.comment: This widget is probably the best facebook widget and i mest with a lot of widgets and this one uploads the best and has no problens like all the othere widgets i had and the face book widget u made was alsome to and i think it would be alsome if u fused together  the Facebook and Twitter widget and made like a friend stream widget like htc has. I think it would be alsome
reviews.author: Taylor Nicty

reviews.title: POOR
reviews.comment: Can\'t even open. Reinstalled twice, still can\'t open. Love all GO products. Please Help.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What the....
reviews.comment: I don\'t know whats going on with the app or if its just my phone but this widget won\'t even open. Is it because i have too much Go app launched on many phone....cause i am using the Go launcher ex, Go themes, Go lockers and etc... help.... i really want to use this fb widget...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: UN-installing! Widget doesn\'t let me log in, can\'t update status. What\'s the use of having a widget if you can\'t use it. Fix it! Till then uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It won\'t update!
reviews.comment: I love the widget, but just recently it does not want to update at the time I set it to..  It only updates when I manually update.  Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: EXCELLENT
reviews.comment: It really worked. I love how it is really convenient for me to see feeds without going on my browser and clicking the fav tab (fb).
reviews.author: Cristina E.

reviews.title: What the hell
reviews.comment: Not working at all.says failed to get access token.plz fix this bug.many have mentioned this issue but you guys are not fixing it.dnt spoil your own reputation :|
reviews.author: manoj sharma

reviews.title: Umm
reviews.comment: I have been having a problem with updating my status! It keeps saying \" fail to send \" Not very happy at this moment!! That\'s why I\'m giving you a 3star instead of a 5star!!
reviews.author: taie burkhart

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Smartphone version won\'t allow likes/comments but tablet version does. I would like to be able to comment on smartphone (Galaxy S2 Skyrocket)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: does not work...
reviews.comment: every time i try to log in..it says failed to receive access token...pls fix this bug..

reviews.title: Notification delay
reviews.comment: I only give it one star only widget\'s looking but no notification at right time kindly fix it then it should b 5 \342\230\205

reviews.title: Widget label is dumb
reviews.comment: Label changed from \"Facebook\" to \"FBWidget\" was a bad call. Ugly and confusing for end user. Please change back!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S2
reviews.comment: Cannot get to work on the latest version of go launcher, says it\'s not compatible and I need to update which I\'ve done and nothing......
reviews.author: Steve Malden

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Absolutely love this app i have had it installed on three different phones, ever since i had my original Droid. I love this developer, i have and love almost all of their apps.
reviews.author: kim del carlo

reviews.title: Plz help,can\'t login
reviews.comment: I can not login to my facebook account via this widget , it is saying \" failed to receive access token\"
reviews.author: vindeshwar kumar
